mapper.sql: id, merchant_id, channel_no, status, validity, start_date, end_date, creater,DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createTime , modifier,DATE_FORMAT(modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modifyTime, version
mapper.insert: insert into gateway_interface_auth ( merchant_id, channel_no, status, validity, start_date, end_date, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, version ) values (#{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 0 ,#{validity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, 0 )

mapper.update:
update gateway_interface_auth
merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
validity = #{validity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = now(), version = version+1
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update gateway_interface_auth
merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
validity = #{validity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from gateway_interface_auth order by create_time desc
